definition: mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of diagnosis and surgical treatment for giant tumor of mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨大纵隔肿瘤的诊断和外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: Conclusion It would be advisable to perform mediastinal operations through the left triangle of auscultation.
sentences.chinese: 结论纵隔手术入路经左听诊三角较好。

sentences.english: Sternotomy open chest operations always lead to anterior mediastinitis, in which symptoms are often slight.
sentences.chinese: 正中开胸手术后均导致前纵隔炎症，症状一般较轻。
纵隔积气可能引起腔静脉梗阻。

sentences.english: This paper reported 13 cases of mediastinal tumor diagnosed by B-mode ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告应用B型超声诊断13例纵隔肿瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusion CT had high value in the diagnosis of mediastinal tumor.
sentences.chinese: 结论CT对于纵隔肿瘤的诊断有较高价值。

sentences.english: For removal of extensive post-mediastinum tumors neurosurgeon should coopperate with thoracal surgeon.
sentences.chinese: 认为胸段突入后纵隔的肿瘤必须会同胸外科联合手术。

sentences.english: The lower differentiation of tumor , the higer incidence of N2 metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤分化程度越低，纵隔淋巴结转移率越高。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the clinical value of diagnosis and treatment in uterine septum by hysteroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估宫腔镜电切术治疗子宫纵隔的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application value of mediastinal neoplasms excision outside of pleura.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸膜外切除纵隔肿瘤的应用价值。

sentences.english: CT scan of the lung reveals mediastinal adenopathy.
sentences.chinese: 肺CT扫描显示纵隔淋巴结肿大。

sentences.english: A purulent pericarditis is most often the result of spread of bacterial infection from lung or mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 化脓性心包炎常由肺或纵隔的细菌感染播散引起。

sentences.english: Objective: To determine the value of intercostal video mediastinoscopy (VMS) in clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨经肋间电视纵隔镜手术在临床应用中的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the value of video mediastinoscopy in clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨电视纵隔镜手术在临床应用中的价值。

sentences.english: Synovial sarcoma is an extremely rare tumor of the mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 纵隔腔的滑膜肉瘤是一个相当罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.english: When the tumor is situated in the posterior mediastinum, compression of the spinal cord may occur.
sentences.chinese: 位于纵隔后部的纵隔淋巴瘤，则易引起脊髓压迫症。

definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
